snippet.title: Chernobylite Pre-Alpha Kickstarter Demo Gameplay [Official]
snippet.description:
☢️🙂☢️ Support us on KICKSTARTER! ☢️🙂☢️ 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/thefarm51/chernobylite-survival-horror-in-3d-scanned-chernob?ref=7cffl2

Add the game to your wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1016800
Get the daily pics on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chernobylite/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ChernobyliteGame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChernobylGame
VK: https://vk.com/chernobylitegame
Discord: https://discord.gg/mehRmzY 

Hey stalkers!

The long-awaited moment has come. Here we go with the raw, unprocessed gameplay from our pre-alpha demo. We made some cuts because the demo is very long (avg. playing time is 1-2 hours) and we wanted to highlight the most important features, not necessarily showing the whole playthrough.
